sentences.en: A generation later, Anakin's son, Luke Skywalker , grew up on the Lars homestead moisture farm.
sentences.cn: 安纳金稍后的下一代儿子路克?天行者在拉斯的水气农场长大.

sentences.en: A homestead cannot be the subject of a sale by court order to satisfy creditor.
sentences.cn: 宅地不能成为法院命令的满足债权人所要求的销售对象.

sentences.en: Could we just wait until he's done with the homestead act chapter?
sentences.cn: 能等到他讲完宅地法那章再走 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had seen the tribulation of the homestead and mankind from his own tribulation.
sentences.cn: 海子从自身苦难体验出发目睹了家园和人类苦难.

sentences.en: He looked around, not just up the road but toward the homestead and edge of the woods.
sentences.cn: 他向四周看了看，看了看路上也看了看宅基地和树林的边缘。

sentences.en: Heavy clouds hang low over a dilapidated homestead in the Midwest, foretelling a possible tornado.
sentences.cn: 厚厚的云层低低地悬在中西部残破的宅地上空，预示可能发生龙卷风。

sentences.en: I, is thy miss, is thy return lover, and is thy dream and warm homestead.
sentences.cn: 而我, 是你的思念, 是你远归的恋人, 是你梦寐里温馨的故园.

sentences.en: In 1862, the Homestead Act was passed.
Lk .11:21 When the strong man , fully armed, guards his own homestead , his possessions are in peace.
sentences.cn: 路十一21壮者全副武装, 看守自己住宅的时候, 他的家业就平安无事.

sentences.en: Protecting the earth our homestead is an unshirkable duty for every earthling.
sentences.cn: 保护地球家园,是每一位在世者义不容辞的责任.

sentences.en: She wanted to domesticate it , I wanted make a present of the homestead and move out.
sentences.cn: 她想留它下来驯养.可我却认为,把我们的住所送给雷龙,我们搬走为上策.

sentences.en: The daylight revealed the whole of Mr. Melbury's homestead.
sentences.cn: 白日的天光,把麦尔布礼先生的整个产业都展现在人们面前.

sentences.en: The Pelly River is a Yukon tributary and site of the territory's first homestead.
sentences.cn: 佩利河是育空河的支流,也是育空河流域最早开发出来的田园.

sentences.en: The Xanadu complex is mutual to Shen Congwen and readers, is human's pursuit and expectation to ideal homestead.
sentences.cn: “桃源”情结是沈从文和读者共有的，是人类对理想家园的追寻和期待。
我们必须重建我们的家园.

sentences.en: Welcome to Mamorc's homestead and have a good time!
sentences.cn: 欢迎您来到无忧家园,并祝愿您在此度过一段美好时光!

sentences.en: When the strong man, fully armed, guards his own homestead, his possessions are in peace.
sentences.cn: 21壮者全副武装, 看守自己住宅的时候, 他的家业就平安无事.

sentences.en: When we reached the homestead and were sitting on the stoep drinking our coffee, we heard that Richard had left quite suddenly and had gone back to England.
sentences.cn: 当我们赶到范·伦斯堡家,坐在他们家屋前的门廊上喝咖啡时, 却听说理查德已经不辞而别回英国去了.

words.tran_cn: 农场所有人；分得土地之定居者；自耕农

trans.tran_en: In United States history, a homestead was a piece of government land in the west, which was given to someone so they could settle there and develop a farm

trans.tran_cn: 在分到的土地上居住并劳作
